Do you love police car driving games. Want to drive and fly with a flying police car?

Bored and tired of playing traditional car driving games. Take up the challenge of driving a flying car of future city. However, be careful about the mountains and skyscraper reaching clouds in this city. Beware of them and make sure that you do not crash into them.
Have you ever dreamt of driving muscle sports and racing cars? Have you ever dreamt of flying an airplane and be a pilot? If yes, then Flying Car Driving Simulation game is a perfect match for your needs. Now you can drive your super sports car and racing sedan cars and do stunts and drifts in dirty off-road or fly your car like as an airplane. Your responsibility will be to drive or fly your flying futuristic car and be a professional car driver or an aircraft flight pilot.
